Uses of Interface
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands.Command

Packages that use Command
Package Description
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands  
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.main  

  • Uses of Command in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands

    Classes in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands that implement Command
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AddBook
    Adds a new book to the library.
    class  AddPatron
    Adds a new patron to the library.
    class  BorrowBook
    Executes the actions needed to lend a book to a patron.
    class  Help
    Displays a help message to the user.
    class  ListBooks
    Shows a list of all library books to the user.
    class  ListPatrons
    Shows a list of all patrons of the library to the user.
    class  LoadGUI
    Starts the GUI of the application.
    class  RenewBook
    Renews a book that is already on loan to a patron.
    class  ReturnBook
    Returns a book to the library.
    class  ShowBook
    Shows detailed information about a specific book.
    class  ShowPatron
    Shows detailed information about a specific patron.

  • Uses of Command in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.main

    Methods in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.main that return Command
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Command CommandParser.parse​(java.lang.String line)
    Get the user input as String and returns the corresponding implementation of the Command interface based on that input.
